input_text:
Job Title: Mortgage Loan Officer | Homebuilder | No Self Gen | Career Growth | Maryland

Location: Maryland, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Finance, Sales

Description:
Are you a team player? Goal oriented? Do you have high energy? Are you an Overachiever and Competitive? 
Amazing opportunity with a Top 5 US Home builder looking to add High Quality Mortgage Loan Officers to their team.
As a Mortgage Loan Officer, you assume full responsibility to guide new home purchasers through the loan process from loan application to loan approval and settlement. You’ll prequalify prospective buyers, review financing options, and assist in repairing credit challenged purchasers as needed. You also serve as the primary point of contact for home buyers throughout the home buying process. You will have a direct impact on the customers ability to secure a loan for their dream home.
ResponsibilitiesAssume full responsibility to guide new home purchasers through the loan process from loan application to loan approval and settlementPrequalify prospective buyers, review financing options, and assist in repairing credit challenged purchasers as neededServe as the primary point of contact for home buyers throughout the home buying processRemain knowledgeable on all available loan programs to compete with lenders and earn each customer’s businessOriginate high quality loan applications and submit to the processing department along with all supporting documentationMaintain weekly contact with all borrowers, brokers, branch personnel, and/or Homebuilding partners to answer questions regarding specific loans, share loan status, and build relationshipsDevelop and maintain strong partnerships with the Homebuilding Sales team to support the monthly sales goals of each communityEducate sales and marketing team members on industry changes and new product offeringsProvide excellent service to the builder and homebuyer while meeting yearly performance goals
QualificationsMust meet National and State licensing requirementsAt least 2 years of professional experience in conventional and government loansStrong knowledge of FNMA, FHA, and State housing loansStrong selling, customer service, and vocational skillsDrug Testing and Credit Check are required
In a cyclical industry this opportunity provides job security with a company that has a long record of sustained success. A company that retains and promotes from within through a robust leadership development program with strong company tenure.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Mortgage Loan Officer
output_json.summary: Top 5 US Home builder seeking High Quality Mortgage Loan Officers.

Assist in repairing credit challenged purchasers
Serve as primary point of contact
Maintain weekly contact with borrowers, brokers, branch personnel, and Homebuilding partners
Educate sales and marketing team on industry changes

other.content: Must meet National and State licensing requirements. At least 2 years of professional experience in conventional and government loans. Strong knowledge of FNMA, FHA, and State housing loans. Strong selling, customer service, and vocational skills. Drug Testing and Credit Check are required.
